_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Ascetics and brahmins who don’t truly un: They don’t realize the origin of the six faculties
They don’t realize the ending of the six faculties
They don’t realize the gratification of the six faculties
They don’t realize the drawback of the six faculties
They don’t realize the escape from the six faculties
Ascetics and brahmins who do truly under: They realize the origin of the six faculties
They realize the ending of the six faculties
They realize the gratification of the six faculties
They realize the drawback of the six faculties
They realize the escape from the six faculties
